resources.string:
Welcome, thanks for choosing our Application. Here"'"s a quick Guide to start right into the action. As you already recognised you need to have a Google account in order to use this App. On the main page you can see when and where you scanned your NFC-Chip or card. You can open the menu by pressing the button in the top left corner, or you can just slide from left to right. in this menu you can add a card or chip to your account, you can contact us per E-Mail if there are any bugs, questions or you just want to send feedback. In order to read a NFC- Tag, you need to hold the card close to the backside of your phone. 
 
 This APP is a project by SuGla 
 Consulting.
Your NFC is disabled. Press back when you enabled it.
Hold your card on the back of the device to add it
Please put in a Name for the tag
This card is already in use
